title: Deep Learning-Based Acoustic Absorption Structure Design Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physics, programming (Python), and machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Practical, socially applicable education program for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the physical properties and design principles of sound-absorbing structures.
A deep learning model can be utilized to implement a mapping relationship between structural parameters and sound absorption coefficient curves
Multi-objective optimization design applying the NSGA-II algorithm can be performed in a simulated environment
A lightweight high-performance sound-absorbing structure can be creatively proposed using VR-based design tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
